```{r setup}
library(testmap)
```


```{r load-packages, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
```

Use the interactive map to check population changes.
```{r make-map}
orinoco <- points_bau |> 
  filter(BASIN_N == "Orinoco") |> st_as_sf() |> st_transform(4326)
# colour palette
leaflet::leaflet(data = orinoco) |> 
  addTiles() |>
  addCircles()
  
```
